about_the_game:
Beyond the earth and among the stars... Magic has reached the cosmos.

Highlighters is the next entry in the action-puzzle genre and is inspired by the charming and stylish titles of the 90s like Tetris Attack and Puzzle Fighter.

Clear tiles by matching 4 or more like-colored pieces together, with at least one of them being a bomb (cross-shaped).

Highlighters is easy on beginners, but also has a lot to offer for the skilled players of competitive, completionist, and speedrunning tastes!

Compelling single-player modes!

  • Classic mode follows the traditional ‘marathon’ type game but with a focused emphasis on speed.​
  • Pull off big combos and chains to complete the game quicker, but watch out as the speed begins to creep up! An intense juggle of skill and difficulty!
  • Also, a charming Adventure mode showcasing the wonderfully weird cast of spellcasting astronauts and robot pirates!
  • Other 1P modes include a brainy Puzzle mode and much more!

Intense multiplayer VS modes!

  • Follows the same fiery spirit of competition as other VS puzzle games!
  • VS modes reward the aggressive and quick thinking!
  • Pull off big combos to have junk blocks come crashing down on your opponent’s board!
  • Thoughtful handicap options are available for the more novice!
(Currently local play only)

A soundtrack that’s out of this world!

  • The Highlighters’ soundtrack is large and varied. With over 20 unique tracks created by the talented ino
  • Wonderfully composed to express the characters and their stages, and overwhelmingly full of energy!

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM

short_description: Highlighters is a fast-paced, match-4, action puzzler inspired by the likes of Tetris Attack and Puzzle Fighter, prioritizing quick thinking and quick thumbs. Featuring stylish pixel art, addictive gameplay, and out-of-this-world music!
